description: This file defines a JPA entity class 'Todo' representing a Todo item with properties like title, description, due date, and timestamps. It includes annotations for ORM mapping, constructors, getters, setters, and lifecycle callbacks for persistence updates.

classes.name: Todo
classes.description: A JPA entity representing a Todo item with attributes like title, description, due date, completion status, and timestamps. Includes lifecycle hooks for automatic timestamp management.

methods.name: Todo
methods.description: Default constructor for the Todo entity.

methods.name: Todo(String title, String description, LocalDate dueDate)
methods.description: Constructor to initialize a Todo item with specified title, description, and due date.

methods.name: prePersist
methods.description: Lifecycle method invoked before the entity is persisted; sets creation and update timestamps.

methods.name: preUpdate
methods.description: Lifecycle method invoked before the entity update; updates the 'updatedAt' timestamp.

methods.name: getId
methods.description: Returns the ID of the Todo item.

methods.name: setId
methods.description: Sets the ID of the Todo item.

methods.name: getTitle
methods.description: Retrieves the title of the Todo.

methods.name: setTitle
methods.description: Sets the title of the Todo.

methods.name: getDescription
methods.description: Retrieves the description of the Todo.

methods.name: setDescription
methods.description: Sets the description of the Todo.

methods.name: isCompleted
methods.description: Checks if the Todo is marked as completed.

methods.name: setCompleted
methods.description: Updates the completion status of the Todo.

methods.name: getDueDate
methods.description: Gets the due date of the Todo.

methods.name: setDueDate
methods.description: Sets the due date of the Todo.
